content: Good day everyone, I am here to share my testimony on how Bitcoin has favored me, I have been a Bitcoin investor for a couple of years now even before I joined this forum,  although I don't know much about Bitcoin I have been quite favored through bitcoin. This should be a word of motivation to all newbies and for those who have joined Bitcoin investment recently,  I have to enunciate that it endures patients and courage to succeed in any investment, I have to use the little profits I earned from bitcoin investment to renovate my one-bedroom apartment for me and my family so we all can be comfortable, my parents are aged and they all need good occupancy. I want to thank the founder of bitcoin and bitcoin talk forum for their good works and I UCHE6215 promise to spreads the good news from bitcoin to my carers,  it's been an honor to be in this forum

comments.author: noorman0

It even sounds more useful.

comments.body: Naturally we all have our testimonies to what bitcoin have benefited us from and as that we usually encourage most people to venture into but not that showing them some of those benefits because whenever they couldn't exercise such patient to hold and makes such benefits it leads them getting worried.So mostly we should always advise people on the benefits bitcoin would fetch them than showing off those achievements, however keep the good work going.

comments.author: traderethereum

comments.author: pergola
comments.body: I entered this market as early as 2017 and couldn't realize the value of Bitcoin when it was only a few hundred dollars. If I had been more patient and assertive I could have gotten married, had children, had a house of my own, and even had a car. Now I have very little because I lost the profit I made.Congratulations. Remember to withdraw regularly.

comments.author: Odusko

If I had been more patient and assertive I could have gotten married, had children, had a house of my own, and even had a car. Now I have very little because I lost the profit I made.Congratulations. comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: It's great to see how bitcoin has affected people's lives, but you didn't tell us how you earned those currencies, when you bought them and how much return on investments.How long would it have taken you if you were not invested in bitcoin? Is this something easy for the rest of the young people, or will they find it difficult to renovate their house if they wish to do so?+ average costs.

comments.author: slaman29
comments.body: Yeah. It's important to know details and context I mean, I get loads of people who used to try convince me to go to some meeting with free food and of course I say yes to free food And it's same stories of wealth and prosperity because of something they got into.And then it turns out they had to invest a lot, even borrowed, and recruited others.Not saying your story is the same or that you made altcoin money whatever, good for you.But how did you get into Bitcoin, how did you buy, and was it a risk? Was it safe? If you saved it in fiat, how much less would you have had?
